meanings.sent1: The treasure hidden in the cave was undreamed by the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The undreamed beauty of the sunset left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The undreamed idea of a flying pig made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her undreamed talent for painting shone brighter than the stars.
meanings.sent5: The undreamed possibilities of the future filled her with excitement.

meanings.definition: Beyond what is possible to imagine
meanings.sent1: The magician's undreamed tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The undreamed vastness of the universe is a mystery to us.
meanings.sent3: The undreamed speed of the turtle in the race made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His undreamed courage in the face of danger inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The undreamed depths of the ocean hold many secrets yet to be discovered.
